verses.verse: And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> <S%G1125>write;<s%> <S%G3592>These<s%> things <S%G3004>said<s%> he that <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars;<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> your <S%G2041>works,<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> that you <S%G2198>live,<s%> and <S%G1488>are<s%> dead. <S%G3498><s%>

Be <S%G1127>watchful,<s%> and <S%G4741>strengthen<s%> the things which <S%G3062>remain,<s%> that are <S%G3195>ready<s%> to <S%G599>die:<s%> for I have not <S%G2147>found<s%> your <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G4137>perfect<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> you have <S%G2983>received<s%> and <S%G191>heard,<s%> and <S%G5083>hold<s%> fast, and <S%G3340>repent.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you shall not <S%G1127>watch,<s%> I will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> you as a <S%G2812>thief,<s%> and you shall not <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> I will <S%G2240>come<s%> on you.

You <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> in <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> have not <S%G3435>defiled<s%> their <S%G2440>garments;<s%> and they shall <S%G4043>walk<s%> with me in <S%G3022>white:<s%> for they are worthy. <S%G514><s%>

He that <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall be <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>raiment;<s%> and I will not <S%G1813>blot<s%> out his <S%G3686>name<s%> out of the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> but I will <S%G1843>confess<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> my <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and <S%G1799>before<s%> his angels. <S%G32><s%>
He that <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>

And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G5359>Philadelphia<s%> <S%G1125>write;<s%> <S%G3592>These<s%> things <S%G3004>said<s%> he that is <S%G40>holy,<s%> he that is <S%G228>true,<s%> he that <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> he that <S%G455>opens,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2808>shuts;<s%> and <S%G2808>shuts,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> opens; <S%G455><s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> your <S%G2041>works:<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I have <S%G1325>set<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> you an <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G2374>door,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2808>shut<s%> it: for you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G1411>strength,<s%> and have <S%G5083>kept<s%> my <S%G3056>word,<s%> and have not <S%G720>denied<s%> my name. <S%G3686><s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I will <S%G1325>make<s%> them of the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> they are <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and are not, but do <S%G5574>lie;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> them to <S%G2240>come<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> your <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and to <S%G1097>know<s%> that I have <S%G25>loved<s%> you.

<S%G3754>Because<s%> you have <S%G5083>kept<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of my <S%G5281>patience,<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> will <S%G5083>keep<s%> you from the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G3986>temptation,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> on <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world,<s%> to <S%G3985>try<s%> them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly:<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> that fast <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have,<s%> that <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> your crown. <S%G4735><s%>

Him that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> will I <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G4769>pillar<s%> in the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of my <S%G2316>God,<s%> and he shall <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> out: and I will <S%G1125>write<s%> on him the <S%G3686>name<s%> of my <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> of my God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2597>comes<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> from my <S%G2316>God:<s%> and I will write on him my <S%G2537>new<s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>
He that <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>

And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2994>Laodiceans<s%> <S%G1125>write;<s%> <S%G3592>These<s%> things <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G281>Amen,<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G3144>witness,<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> your <S%G2041>works,<s%> that you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G5593>cold<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2200>hot:<s%> I <S%G3785>would<s%> you <S%G1498>were<s%> <S%G5593>cold<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> hot. <S%G2200><s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> then <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G5513>lukewarm,<s%> and <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G5593>cold<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2200>hot,<s%> I <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G1692>spew<s%> you out of my mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4145>rich,<s%> and <S%G4147>increased<s%> with <S%G4147>goods,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G3762>nothing;<s%> and <S%G1492>know<s%> not that you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G5005>wretched,<s%> and <S%G1652>miserable,<s%> and <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and naked: <S%G1131><s%>

I <S%G4823>counsel<s%> you to <S%G59>buy<s%> of me <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G4448>tried<s%> in the <S%G4442>fire,<s%> that you may be <S%G4147>rich;<s%> and <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>raiment,<s%> that you may be <S%G4016>clothed,<s%> and that the <S%G152>shame<s%> of your <S%G1132>nakedness<s%> do not <S%G5319>appear;<s%> and <S%G1472>anoint<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> with eye <S%G2854>salve,<s%> that you may see. <S%G991><s%>
As <S%G3745>many<s%> as I <S%G5368>love,<s%> I <S%G1651>rebuke<s%> and <S%G3811>chasten:<s%> be <S%G2206>zealous<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and repent. <S%G3340><s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door,<s%> and <S%G2925>knock:<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G191>hear<s%> my <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G2374>door,<s%> I will <S%G1525>come<s%> in to him, and will <S%G1172>sup<s%> with him, and he with me.

To him that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> will I <S%G1325>grant<s%> to <S%G2523>sit<s%> with me in my <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2504>even<s%> as I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G3528>overcame,<s%> and am <S%G2523>set<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> with my <S%G3962>Father<s%> in his throne. <S%G2362><s%>
He that <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>
